citations.narrative:
The facility has an attending veterinarian (AV) that makes scheduled visits and a written program of veterinary care (PVC)
as seen in records, however the written PVC is not signed by the current AV. The written PVC is required to be signed by
the AV to help verify that the PVC has been reviewed and approved by the current AV. Ensure to get the written PVC
reviewed and signed by the current AV.
***Correct by 2/24/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has an attending veterinarian (AV) that makes scheduled visits and a written program of veterinary care (PVC) 
as seen in records, however the written PVC is not signed by the current AV. The written PVC is required to be signed by 
the AV to help verify that the PVC has been reviewed and approved by the current AV. Ensure to get the written PVC 
reviewed and signed by the current AV.  
***Correct by 2/24/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
